name: Weliron
description:
I made this Flash game as a starter project at a company I workef for. It's a Space Invaders style ship shooting game.

Controls:

Mouse - Move Ship

Space - Shields(after unlocking it). Press and Hold

There are no levels in the game and no bosses(though I meant to make one :) ), but there is a coundown timer top right which says how much left of the game tiem there is left. When it expires the player's score is evaluated and he's given a Rank.

You start-off only with HP and recieve shields in early-mid game. You have no lives, dying makes the game restart. It is not meant to be easy

Music:

Bar9 - Encounter Blaze Remix
